name: Fireway
description:
Made in 1 week for the 5th ESCOM videogame club jam. A one-level procedural-generated platformer.

-----

You've been entrusted the holy task and you have gone down to the underground catacombs of your hometown. Enter the darkness and to the depths where your destiny awaits.

Use WASD or the arrow keys to move the character and space to start the game and skip the dialogs.
